body_html:
That would work well for me. I'm currently building with CMake using a hack which upstreams the patch, also did a similar thing for Bazel. But yeah, if you can amend TF master to do it automatically for Bazel/Cmake, that would be great.
…
On Sat, 8 Sep 2018, 00:24 Gunhan Gulsoy, ***@***.***> wrote: @trias702 <https://github.com/trias702> @bstriner <https://github.com/bstriner> would you like to upstream this patch into eigen? Then we can simply bump TF eigen dependency to get the fix? — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. body:
That would work well for me.

I'm currently building with CMake using a hack which upstreams the patch,
also did a similar thing for Bazel.

But yeah, if you can amend TF master to do it automatically for
Bazel/Cmake, that would be great.


On Sat, 8 Sep 2018, 00:24 Gunhan Gulsoy, <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> @trias702 <https://github.com/trias702> @bstriner
> <https://github.com/bstriner> would you like to upstream this patch into
> eigen?
> Then we can simply bump TF eigen dependency to get the fix?
>
> —
